values:
Since I've been super sick with "Sars" I've lost a few pounds and It makes me want to shed more off my body so the west hollywood guys and gals can say "HEY" I figure, what the hell, I need to change my diet anyway due to my ulcers and shit. 

So it's been a while since I've written up in here. Since friday, I've been sick with a fever of 103.00 at the highest. Kinda silly huh? it's because my body is so tired from all the stress it's been through it needed a rest. I've been sleeping like 20 hours pretty much because of the fever. I thank Mr. Drew Warner of GayPORNSTUDIO.COM for being such a nice guy and friend for checking on me daily. 

Today Krusty was brought to the park for a little run. I opened the gate and this hoe bag was like "GET YOUR DOG OUT" I was like what the....it appears that she was mistaken and thought Krusty bit her dog. I told her if Krusty bit your dog, well then the dog deserved it! BAMB... for real, Krusty gives warnings and if the dogs, OR People do not listen, she will snap. I do not blame Krusty because I would do the same thing pretty much. You can only take so much ya know. 

Anyway, It's almost the weekend and I am still sick lol... I will write more later on.. right now Im going to count sheep again!!!!

Till then~!

Today was a very stressful day. I woke up at 7am as usual and walked Krusty and then got ready for my doctors appointment. I've been going to the colon place at Cedars for about a month now and I still do not have an honest prognosis. All I know is I have this think called Ulcerative Colitis and I take 12 pills now a day. I also have to get this Iv treatment and have been going everyday now for the past weeks. This is why I am not on LJ or my updating you on my on-goings because I get very weak and sleep a lot. Today I had my Iv treatment and the fucking vein clogged and made a nice little bubble in my arm, thus causing my arm to hurt and having to get another catheter in my other arm. It takes at least 4 fucking hours for this blessed treatment for this damn colitis shit and it drains the hell out of me. ARRGH! So, let me update you on some happy things. I took Drew Warner and Joey to MTV's Icon with Metallica We had GREAT seats and got to chat up with Michelle Branch, This guy from Fuel, the blonde one I'm not sure of his name but anyway, to say the least we had fun. Joey and I will be taking Drew and another friend to MTV's Movie Awards , it should be fun because I can't wait to see just WHOM we'll be sitting next to this time. I'll have to have to chat up another Celeb so the think I'm a nut. LOL. I tell ya, this guy from Fuel really didn't like the fact that I commented on his hair lol I was like "I really like your hair" lol. Overall the event was fun and I can't wait for the Movie Awards. It's late and I need to head to bed. Till then~

I'm sorry this is a friends only journal now. Add me and I'll add you back.

-Carlo Ricci

My more naughty journal can also be found at http://joeyandcarlo.com at XXX DIARIES...

So this past weekend I went on an interview and got myself a job. Holy shit, lets just say I will be making a hella lot more than when I was a manager at a hotel. My new job will be in Santa Monica, which isn't all that bad because I really enjoy my new boss. I will have health insurance, car insurance and holy shit this job is off the chain. 

Of course since my wardrobe is ancient, I needed to go shopping for some dress clothes so I can wear to work. I was so pooped that day but I did get the right clothes, however they need to go to the tailor. I've been going to the gym like everyday but of course on New Years Eve, I broke my little toe, actually two of them. So, I can't do cardio, which kind of pisses me off. 

I figure this week I'll Be back on the ball. Since my gym is open 24 hours, I can go after my new job and continue to sculpt my body!  It has been so hot in this apt its not even funny Arrgh! 

I am about to head to AVN and drop off some photos; they will be giving us a 2-page article on the awards, cool huh? Anyway thank you for the New Years wishes and I wish you all a Happy and Healthy one! 

Till then~

I will begin with my evening on Tuesday because that was the best time this week. I was with Anthony and Brad, which was fun because it's "Our night at Rage" for Hip HOP. Before I headed over there I had a great dinner with Drew at this posh restaurant called Morton's, which is located in West Hollywood on Robertson Blvd. I had a glass of merlot and the best chicken breast ever topped with sugar snap peas. After dinner we decided to get a martini or 2 at the Abby. While at the Abby, we met Anthony Holloway and Brad Rudolph for a drink just before heading to Rage.


Friday I headed to San Francisco for a photo show held at the Holiday Inn. I arrived and decided I would take a little rest before heading out to Badlands. While watching the TV they announced that it was Fleet week in San Fran... Woooo HOOO... I was so stoked lol. This means all the military boys would be hitting the bars. We ended up going to Badlands that evening and danced the night away. Early Saturday morning we headed to Napa Valley for the wine tours. Before we headed there we ate at this nice Italian restaurant called Melo's, which was in a city called Pleasantville. It was really good... Oh, I forgot to mention whom the hell I went to SF with. lol.. I went with my friend Jim and Tony. Okay, back to the restaurant.. We had this bread that was brought to the table and of course I wanted some garlic to go with it.. I ended up getting some olive oil and crushed garlic to dip the bread in. The guys were so annoyed with the smell of the garlic; they were on my case about the damn garlic lol. So I tried convincing them to eat the garlic but I didn't succeed. They just don't know what's good for them.  

The wine trails were so beautiful. We were going to take the train tour but it was all sold out. I was pissed because I love trains and it was a 3 and half hour ride. We drove to one of my favorite vineyards, Robert Mondovi. I wasn't really that impressed so We headed back to the hotel and got ready for dinner.  Dinner was this Chinese restaurant, which was rather amusing with the entire decor and the fun staff. The food was mediocre, however filling. After dinner we made a quick retreat to the hotel for a little nap before heading to Badlands.  On Sunday it was time for the photo show. We headed to the location and in the conference room where everything was taking place. The photos pretty cool but the best part was meeting this lady vendor which was so entertaining. 


Now its back to work and planning the awards show in December.

Till then~

I can't upload photos on this entry because IM not in LA where the programs and photos are at. 

It all begins on Thursday the day before my trip. I was making last minute arrangements to make the NY event run as smooth as my ass. lol.. Anyway, I called Chi Chi Larue to coordinate the banner pick up. While on the phone with her, I was asked for a favor.... the favor.......Ready for this?

I was asked to do a scene for one of her productions starring Lance Gear, called "2nd Gear" At first I was thinking about my trip and the time contracts so I said no... BUT, she promised I wouldn't be long it would take about an hour. With that said, and knowing how much I love being in front of any type of camera, I agreed to assist Chi Chi and was on my way to the studios. 

I was a little pissed because I try to be punctual but was about 10 minutes late for the shoot. For some reason I thought the studio was around the corner from my place. I was so wrong and was walking forever to find the damn place. I called Chi Chi and assured her I would be there ASAP. I finally arrived and was greeted by "Mona" and Chi Chi herself along with the production staff which was very nice and accommodating.  

I was whisked away to the make-up chair and was done up for my "on screen" performance along with Lance Gear and Gavin. Lance was so nice and made me feel so comfortable during the filming. It was a great experience and I think Chi Chi Larue, from what I experienced, is VERY professional while on set. 

Friday I was on my way to the airport at 6am with no sleep. I was so fucking tired and was so looking forward to sleeping on the plane. It took about 8 hours before I arrived in Rochester, NY. It was a long flight and as always, didn't get any sleep because of some little bastards screaming on the flight. I was greeted by Anthony Holloway, Brad Rudolph, Chad, Mike and Alan from the club. We all waited for Billy Herringtons flight to arrive which was due to arrive about an hour after I came in. When Billy arrived, we all immediately headed to a 5 star Italian restaurant for a nice dinner. 

After dinner, Billy and the boys went to the hotel to freshen up and I headed over to the club with Alan to set up. I got to meet Carlos (SO reminds me of Danny Lopez) and was given my favorite, "appletini" 

CONT: Tomorrow.. Im tired and being lazy.

Me at Norms West Hollywood... getting ready to order... photo: Gregg Collins.
My weekend retreat to Palm Springs was so needed. Joey myself and our friend we'll call leaf, headed to our destination, The Tortuga Del Sol, (http://www.tortugadelsol.com) our first stop was KFC for a light lunch. Okay, it was a heavy one since they made our order twice and just gave us the extra order. I believe the new hire messed up and was reprimanded for the fuck up. It took about four hours with the Friday commute. We arrived around six and checked in the hotel. The room we stayed in was a bit larger than the regular Joey And Carlo Suite... lol. It was like a little apt and so well decorated. Rick and Rob, the host's of the resort are so nice and classy, they make the stay all the more pleasant. We settled in and talked for a few before heading to target for some undies. Our friend forgot his undies. We picked up a light dinner and headed back to the hotel where we lounged in the Jacuzzi for a few hours. Once we were all relaxed and clean, we headed over to Hunters Bar for some play. It was so dead but they had some interesting go-go dancers, which made the evening interesting for all. After about maybe an hour, we headed back to the resort where we took advantage of the resorts Jacuzzi again. I ended up swimming in the pool for a swimming exercise. The Following day we all woke up at 8:32 am to meet our breakfast by the pool by 9am. At 10, we had a meeting with the hosts on upcoming events in Palm Springs we're involved in, more on that later. Later that evening, we headed over to Warm Sands area. I wanted to show my friend the craziness of Warm Sands. It's so interesting, you can have 2 movies out of the content in that area. With all the boys cursing and shit, my goodness lol. So we met this one boy who gave us the run down on Warm Sands etc. He was rather interesting and very accommodating to our need for knowledge on Sands. We parted our ways and headed for the Tortuga Del Sol for a midnight dip in the Jacuzzi and a late night swim. Again it was very relaxing and so needed. We woke up the next day and had breakfast; Joey and I received a haircut from Ricardo. He sure does cut hair pretty well. We all vegged by the pool soaking up the sun and drank these Awesome frozen drinks, so weak tasting yet, very strong. Mingling with the guests, Laying in the sun getting burned, we felt it was time to head home. We said our goodbyes to the boys "Rob And Rick" then headed home. Till then

Me at House Of Blues VIP Party, Chicago... Don't ya love the Art?

My Chicago trip was fun. I'm being lazy and don't want to write much about it because there is so much to tell. I did hang out with Falcon exclusive, Matt Rush, Sam Dixon, Drew Warner, Matt and Nate (cornfedboyz) Chad Hunt, Brett Wolf, and many more stars throughout the weekend. All I have to do is give a very big THANK YOU do one of our sponsors that has played a very big part in our party. Drew Warner of Tango Blues Entertainment, which companies include, Sports N' Recreation Video, GayPornStudio.com, Cornfedboyz.com and of course, Inside Porn Magazine. Drew has included us in his events in Chicago by introducing me and placing flyers at all his events in Chicago. I had so much fun In Chicago especially with Sean Storm and Chad Hunt! We had a late, er early dinner PASTA that we didn't eat at 4am. While we all watched "The Others" I got an awesome foot massage from Chad. I so wanted to sleep with him. lol. Anyway, of course, I reciprocated and gave him the best massage. So I am done with my Chicago trip.lol. Um, did I mention I was locked in a cage at IML? Lol... OH, and a BIG shout out to Anthony Holloway! Can I just say that boy can fucking dance? Anthony is a very nice boy from our site, and he's also a porn star. Anthony has become a great friend to Joey and I. He will be coming out to LA this July to hang out at San Diego Pride. Anthony will also join me At Muthers IN Rochester, NY but you'll have to read the rest of the journal to get all the specs. WHICH brings me to Last Sunday. I received a call from the lovely Chi Chi Larue, inviting us to lunch on Monday. She was shooting for Falcon Studios up in San Fran and was in town for like 2 days but wanted to meet with us regarding the pool party. We made arrangements to meet on Monday but if for some reason she had to continue filming, we would have to reschedule for Tuesday. Chi CHi asked which restaurant we liked and of course, I was the hog and only thought of myself when I said, "CHIN CHIN on sunset" lol. Joey so doesn't like that restaurant lol. So Monday rolls around and we met up with Jason Sechrest to head to David Forest's office. It was like 10am and I just checked mail for some reason and got an email from Mr. Forest asking us what we wanted from Starbucks. I sent him our order, which I thought was very nice of him. So we get picked up by Sechrest, Our publicist for the pool party, Jasoncurious.com and headed to the valley to meet Forest. We arrived a bit early like at 10:30 so we just ended up going in the office while Mr. Forest headed to starbucks as promised. We waited for him to return for our meeting on Ryan Idol, Jeremy Tucker, Jason McCain, and Rocky to be involved with our pool party. When David arrived back to the office, he had all these pastries and shit for us to munch on during the meeting. Of course the plate was set in front of me of all people and as we ironed the deal out, I ate the whole fucking plate lol. Talk about a pig huh. lol.. Anyway, this is when we got Ryan Idol and the other guys on board to help raise money for AIM, Adult Industry Medical. After the meeting we headed to this Greek restaurant with Jason for another pow wow. Jason treated us to a delicious Greek meal, which was really fun. While we were at lunch, Chi Chi called to cancel our lunch because she will be shooting over the time expected and we would reschedule for Tuesday. It was all-good because I was so impressed with the professionalism Chi CHi has shown. Tuesday we met Chi CHi at Chin Chin...lol.. This flow's huh. Chi CHi at Chin Chin.lol anyway, Chi Chi arrived and we all ordered lunch and discussed the pool party and touched up on our awards. And the involvement she would play in the events. We finished lunch at which point Chi Chi gave us a lift home. Later that evening I headed over to West Hollywood to get a fruit drink with Drew Warner. I received a call from Chi CHi letting us know that She would be more than happy to be a part of our event. SO, Chi Chi will be the HOST of our Pool Party on Saturday. Now all we needed to plan was the sponsor to the "XXX search" We were looking for a studio to sponsor it. Drew Warner had mentioned Rascal Video earlier in our conversations so while on the phone with Chi CHi, I asked her if she would be the Studio sponsor to that event. So as it stands, we have Chi Chi as the Host of the day and Her Company, Rascal Video as the studio sponsor. Please visit http://www.joeyandcarlo.com/party for all party information regarding the events on goings and such. SO...This is great, we have so many great sponsors. Including Buygay.com, nakedsword.com, toys4joy.com, Unzipped Magazine, Cybersocket Magazine, Masterbeat Entertainment, GaypornStudio.com, Sports n' Recreation Video, Inside Porn Magazine, Monster Bang Video, Boiling Point Productions, Tribal Pulse Productions, Bedfellows.com, Andrew Christian (Clothing designer) IMD Video, Sex4hotmen.com, Chi Chi's Rascal Video, http://ChiChiLarue.com, Marks Restaurant, Frontiers Magazine both La and San Francisco, Pulp ps Bottom Line magazine and many more.... PHEW... what a list huh? It's going to be a great big huge party!!!!!! YEY!!!!! OK NOW COMES MUTHERS ROCHESTER, NY.... I will be going home for a family wedding so I've decided to have an event at Muthers. I've been speaking with my friend Alan over in Rochester about doing an event there. What Better way to have an event than to include THE ONE AND ONLY, Miss. Heather Skye? I LOVE HEATHER... So anyway, I will be in Rochester NY on August 23rd at 9pm sponsoring a drag show and will be bringing some Porn Boys with me. SUPERSTAR, BILLY HERRINGTON, http://www.billyherrington.com, COVER model for INSIDE PORN MAGAZINE will be on hand to SIGN autographs for all his fans in ROCHESTER. We will be giving away Porn, DVD's Magazines, and a bunch of other goodies for the Rochester fans. WAIT>>> THIS JUST IN>>>>> THIS JUST IN>>>>>> Anthony Holloway just called me and said, "CARLO, I would love to come to NY with you for your event" So ROCHESTER will not only see Billy Herrington, but they will also get to meet HOT PORNSTAR, Grabby Winner, Anthony Holloway!!!! Boy is it going to be a night! Ok. As I was writing this entry, Anthony im'd me and said that he was unable to make it to Rochester NY :( it's okay. I will see him at San Diego Pride so it's all good. Some of the sponsors to this event in ROCHESTER NY are also sponsors to our Pool Party in Palm Springs, CA. They include, Unzipped Magazine, Inside Porn Magazine, Chi Chi Larue's Rascal Video, ChiCHIlarue.com, Sex4hotmen.com, and of course, IMD, We have to give a special props to Madelon over at IMD, International Media Distributors, for all she's doing for joeyandcarlo.com our fundraising for AIM. She has also signed on board to send me to Rochester with a few goodies for all the east coast fans. Friday we headed to Palm Springs with Drew Warner (http://gaypornstudio.com) for one night. We needed to look at the ccbc property again to map things out. Joey and I stayed at the Tortuga Del http://www.tortugadelsol.com Sol, One of my favorite retreats. We checked in after all our work and said hello to RIck and Robert, the hosts of the property and then headed to ALL Worlds Resort where Drew was staying. We arrived at All Worlds Resort and were greeted by Fernando; the vivacious clerk who is the best think All Worlds could do for PR. HE is a HOOT! As a former hotel Manager, I can see he will take that property very far and the revenue will sky rocket. (I forgot, before we traveled to the All Worlds, we got some Vodka at the drug store.) Drew checked in the hotel and we headed up to his suite. We had some drinks and went to mingle with the Guests of the hotel. Later in the evening we ran into this really hot boy from Antigua and boy did he ever have a big dick. That thing was huge. He was giving me the "Smile" We chatted a bit and then I gave him my card. He drifted to the bathroom, My Kind of guy. Of course I started to follow him until his partner said something that basically made me nervous. I was about to go blow him in the bathroom lol. Nothing came about that so we ended up leaving for Hunters bar. While there I started talking to this JEWISH man who was really hot. He was talking about his fisting party he's in town for. lol. Hey, as long as he's cute and Jewish, I don't care. Anyway, while I was talking with drew and the other guy, Joey was getting picked up by this elder man trying to pretend he was in a frat house. They both ended up leaving toward the back area. For about 14minutes or so Joey comes running and said "Lets go" Drew and I decided ok. We ended up leaving wondering why he wanted to leave so abruptly. Apparently, this man wanted Joey to visit him in the bathroom. We returned to our respective hotels and called it a night. Joey and I went in the Tortuga Del Sol's Jacuzzi. I could only take so much. I ended up getting out and jumped in the pool to take a swim. Okay, we really need a pool because that was great exercise. We ended up going to bed. On the bed we noticed that we were given a free comp massage.... well they only give them to the VIP lol. I am just kidding so yeah, while I swam and soaked up the sun, chit chatted with the other guests, Joey got a massage from Rick. We left the property and our driver; Jackson Price came by to escort us to the All Worlds Resort. We walked in the door and were greeted by the king of Porn, MR. Rick Ford, All Worlds Video. It was a pleasure speaking with him briefly and can't wait to have more chats with Mr. Ford. Sunday I'm going to be lazy and plagiarize... well Sunday, Ill let drew tell you... here's what he says: Then this evening to catch Beth Lapidus' UnCabaret Theater with Julia Sweeny (Pat from Saturday Night Live), Andy Kindler, and other fly by the seat of your pants comedians that change regularly. It's a great show happening once a month at the Knitting Factory in Hollywood so try to catch it! Monday I had Breakfast with Drew Warner again at Eat-Well. Nick Di Martino stopped in to say hello. Later in the evening we headed over to Michael Brandon's BBw It was so nice to see Matt Sizemore Bret Wolfe and Michael's We had to leave early because ben needed to work and since it was 6:14 we needed to jet. I really would have enjoyed the hamburger. Today, I had Lunch with Drew Warner at Jonnie Rockets while he got his cars walked. When the bill came, the waiter asked, "Are you guys together?" Drew's response was NO lol. He's my stalker lol. In the evening we headed to Hamburger Hamlet for dinner and soda. It was fun and a great stress reliever. After Drew went home Joey and I decided to watch Scooby dOo... it was so funny and highly recommended... Till then~

Me with Chi Chi Larue, Director/Producer gay and straight indy



It was 6 am and I was about to be picked up. My packing was almost finished, some damp clothes but I was so ready to fly. The only problem I was facing was fatigue. I was so fucking tired from the activities the early evening and morning; I was so not looking forward to flying. All I wanted to do was sleep all day. I was picked up by a black town car with tinted windows and headed to the airport. We hopped on the plane and were on the way to Chicago with a 4-hour flight. The flight was cool, I was so tired I decided to at least try to get a cat nap in however, I was so afraid I was flying to Chicago and that something may happen while in flight. I chatted with Drew Warner (gaypornstudio.com) and Sam Dixon (Boilingpointxxx.com) most of the flight. We were due to arrive in Chicago early but something was brewing because the captain came on the pa and said "we will be circling for a few minutes, please be patient." Apparently, the weather in Chicago was a bit bad for us to approach so we had another serving of soft drinks. We ended up landing and jumped in a cab to head to the hotel in which we were staying at. Once we arrived at this hotel Allegro, I was so wanting to head to bed. I entered the hotel with the boys and was so impressed with the decor, ambiance and overall look and class of the hotel. Being a former Hospitality Manager, I notice and appreciate Posh Hotels. As I walked in the corridor, I noticed the Marble floors; Staff everywhere and boy were they so friendly. We headed to the reception area, which was another surprise in itself. With Plush furniture, grand Piano, one has to ask what the rating was. I asked the clerk "Chris" what the Hotel rating was. His response, "well, we would be a five star property, however, we do not have 24 hour room service and a pool." I so believed it the moment I stepped foot on the property. In the lobby area guests, formal clad, were networking, chatting and waiting for the elegant wine tasting the hotel offers everyday. I so wanted to be here lol. Once checked in, I received my room number and key and we were all on the way to our respectful rooms. With Drew and Sam on the 11th floor, silly me stayed close to the bottom, just in case lol. Just kidding. I was on the 4th floor, ready for this, in the nicest suite I've ever been in. Reason being, I liked the music motif throughout the suite. I walked in and was so amazed with the beauty of the room, but kind of expected it to be elegant being it was a 4 star property. I toured two rooms and went to the bathroom to find a luxury I have needed for quite some time, a Jacuzzi tub! I was in heaven. We ended up meeting in the properties only 5 star rating, 312 restaurant. Drew, Sam and I all ordered a chicken dinner, which was so divine. The Italian restaurant, with Italian wait staff and Chef's were so fucking hot, I knew what my fantasy would be when I retreat to the suite for a well needed jack-off session. Till then~ Stay Tuned for more on my Chicago trip.

AIM is having an event on Saturday and we're going to show our support. It's with Straight and Bisexual Porn Stars. Come join Joey and I along and friends as we dance the night away with some really HOT Guys and Gals. Our friend Sharon Mitchell will be the host so lets show our support.

E-mail me if you wish to come and be with our group. Till then~

Okay, 

This moving is getting to me. Im still checking mail at a fucking cafe in hollywood across the Hustler BAR. Friday I had lunch with a really hot guy I can't have lol.. As I sat at the table, I wanted to take my leg and brush it up on his.... hmm...FAT CHANCE.. lol.. I don't so.. HE WAS my crush. I am no longer loosing sleep over it. LOL.. anyway, after lunch Joey and I joined Drew Warner and J.C. Adams for the premier of Jason Curious' "The Young And The Curious." It was very interesting. Lasted about an hour.. After the show, went home ended up having a late dinner with a friend. 

Other than that, just waiting for the net connection to be up. Should be up by wednesday. 

Im thinking about heading to a club this weekend with a friend. Maybe I'll get lucky! lol... We'll see.. 


Till then~
